reviewText: My son loves this video set.  He watches it all the time.  It's a must have for the Dragon Tale fan!

This is one of the typical Carlo Verdone's roles: the clumsy umprepared one who tries to cheat other people in order to get what he wants, but he does it in a such funny way that is impossible not to laugh!  He's great when he mimes the innocent one and tries to behave as a very cultured priest in front of a demanding woman who's asking about the book he should have written! This is at the base of the Roman comic spirit, from where a lot of other Italian actors took their inspiration.
